file_content.text: It's probably best if we don't speak.
Well, our blackmailer returns. Back for the crystal, no doubt. Thank you for keeping our secret.
Of course.
Because of your help, we're going to show everyone a new way for the Jedi.
Don't fool yourself, Spanios. If not for the crystal, we'd have been exposed.
Just hand it over and we can be done with this.
Give up the crystal.
Bloodsucker.
You got what you wanted, my sweet. It's a small price to pay.
Don't mind her. Good luck to you.
Stay well.
Try to stay under the radar, will you? I don't want it coming out that I did this for you.
Don't get caught.
We will try, thanks.
Hold onto that lady, Spanios. She's a keeper.
Moracen is trouble.
I sure think so.
I changed my mind. I'm not here to accept the bribe--just to wish you both the best.
Forget about the crystal.
We heard that you kept our love a secret. Thank you.
Don't be naive, my love. Why didn't you tell Master Silvarte? What are you after?
It may be hard for you to comprehend, but I have no ulterior motive.
I seek nothing.
You amaze me, my friend... but I think I understand. You're giving us a chance to end our relationship and find our way back to the code ourselves. Right?
Save yourselves by renouncing your romance.
End this love, Spanios.
Yes, I see now. Moracen, my love, a feeling of wrongness overtakes me. We must end our romance.
Spanios, no.
I will continue to be your fellow and friend, but I dedicate myself to the code now.
Now, if only Moracen can follow your lead.
You saw the light, Spanios.
Don't hold your breath!
I'm glad.
No!
That has to hurt. Sorry to ruin your life.
Tough luck, Moracen.
Get your smug face out of here!
I will never forgive you for this! You've stunted the evolution of the Jedi way today.
In time, maybe you'll see things differently.
I hope you come around.
The Jedi way does not need to change.
The code is perfect.
I don't really care about evolution or your forgiveness.
Doesn't matter to me.
Just get out of my sight! Leave me to my broken heart.
I will stay here with Moracen, friend. I believe I can reason with her. Thank you again.
You have me all wrong. You two should continue to follow your passion.
I wouldn't dream of that.
See, my love, our friend here has been transformed by our love.
Then I'm filled with hope. Thank you, friend. Be well.
I changed my mind. I do want the crystal. Hand it over.
Just what you offered before.
If our love is an expression of the dark side, then what is your greed?
Hush, Moracen. Our secret is now safe. The crystal is yours, friend.
Excellent.
She has a funny way of saying thank you.
She's ungrateful.
Accept my thanks for the both of us.
I could still hold this over you. So be happy that's all I want.
You're lucky I'm not greedy.
We are blessed by your tolerance and mercy.
Here's the crystal. Goodbye, friend.
I don't care if you both fall to the dark side.
Just letting you be corrupted.
Whatever the motivation, thank you for keeping our secret safe.
Love will transform and strengthen the Jedi way. You'll see.
Perhaps you're right. For your sakes, I hope you're right. May the Force be with you.
Good luck with that.
You're wrong.
Say hello to the Emperor for me.
You'll betray the Jedi.
Just get out of my sight.
Good luck to you, friend.
Why are you still foraging here? We're not going anywhere. You'll get your precious payoff if you keep our love a secret.
You better not reveal our love to Master Silvarte and Master Yollo.
You found it! Well done, Moracen!
Oh, Spanios. I couldn't have done it without you.
You're amazing. I don't care what the Masters say--we're proving everyone wrong. Come here and give me a kiss....
Well, it seems your Masters' concerns were valid.
This confirms everything.
Don't mind me.
When you're done with him, I'll take one too.
I'm next.
Go ahead, plant one on him. I would--he's cute.
Kiss him.
Who are you?
This isn't what you think it is.
I think you two are romantically involved.
You're in love.
Okay, maybe it is what you think it is.
Spanios!
You have nothing to worry about. I'm a friend.
Relax. It's going to be fine.
Oh really?
You say you're a friend--does that mean you're not here to blow the whistle on our romance?
Fine, yes, Moracen and I are in love. And if you have a problem with that, I advise you to keep it to yourself.
Spanios, you just confirmed the truth to this person.
I'm sorry, my love, but I'm sick of hiding. The order is wrong.
Tell me--what makes you think the order is wrong?
Explain that.
They teach us to overcome and excise our fears, yes?
Do you want to be drummed out of the Jedi?
You're risking expulsion.
They would be fools to deny us entrance into the order.
Romantic entanglements cloud reason. Passion leads to the dark side.
You will fall to darkness.
That's the rhetoric of the unenlightened, friend.
Fear, not emotion, is the adversary of the Jedi way. Ironically, the Masters fear emotion, and therefore they deny us its bounty.
The power of our love is why we work so well together. Our teamwork allowed us to find this rare lightsaber crystal.
So our passion actually strengthens the order.
Let's ask your Masters about that. I think they'll be hard to convince.
You won't find many who agree.
I don't think so.
Maybe you're right, but it's not for me to decide.
I do not presume to know.
Spanios, please help me convince this upstart not to expose us!
I love you, Moracen. And so if you believe we must remain hidden, I honor that. But it may take a sacrifice.
You mean the crystal. I agree, my love.
Friend, if you tell the Masters we're not romantically involved, we'll give you this powerful crystal for your future lightsaber. Would that buy your silence?
I'll decide what to do when I return to the Masters.
We'll see.
We will hold out hope.
Bribery, Spanios? You're only proving the Jedi Code right--your fall is upon us.
You should be ashamed.
No! I cannot let you go!
Moracen, no! Don't lash out in anger! He is only following his own path.
Moracen, stop! Do not succumb to anger! She must be true to her own beliefs.
Just go, friend. Do what you will.
That sounds pretty good to me, but I'm not sure I can trust you.
Can I believe you?
Don't fear. I will keep my word.
If you tell the Masters you found nothing suspicious here, come back to us, and we'll give you the crystal.
Don't you dare try to fool us; we will know if you do.
We're busy. Please let us be.
I have eyes. Don't treat me like an idiot.
That's bunk.
Don't lie to me. It's obvious.
